body.name: 14 Inch Metal Full Bed Frame with Mattress Slide Stopper - Double Black Basic Anti Squeak Steel Slats Platform, Easy Assembly Heavy Duty Noise Free Bedframes, No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 59 mins
features: 1️⃣ ASSEMBLY DIMENSION - The full bed frame: 53.4" x 74.5", Suitable Mattress: 54" x 75". Maximum weight capacity of this bed frame full size: 2000 lbs. There is 12.6 inches from the floor, which provides enough space for storing boxes, clothes, toys, quilts, etc.

2️⃣ NOISE ELIMINATION - No Box spring needed for the full size platform bed frame. Rubber cushion of the metal bed frame full is good for noise elimination, Every bed legs designed with anti-scratch gaskets to protect your fancy floor and provides you with a peaceful sleep.

3️⃣ SIMPLE STYLE - The full platform bed frame is completely simple style. This black bed frame full is the prefect choice for residence bedroom, guest rooms, dormitories, apartments and short visiting families or friends.

4️⃣ STURDY MATERIAL - Because we have chosen the high-quality materials, this metal full bed frames is quite durable and solid. Unlike other beds, this black full size bed frame has 9 thicken legs, which has the extra strong support. We believe once you get this full bedframe, you will like it.

5️⃣ EASY ASSEMBLE - Easy to assemble heavy full size bed frames, with clear step-by-step instructions to help you easily assemble. The full mattress bedframe is placed in a box. All parts of metal full size bed frame are labeled clearly, which is easy to assemble, and can be assembled by one person within 20 minutes.

6️⃣ MATTRESS NON SLIP GASKETS PREPARED - Anti slip mattress gripper is made of high-quality plastic. The mattress holder for bed frame is sturdy and resistant to deformation, providing an extra secure connection to prevent the mattress from slipping and keep mattress in place.

7️⃣ VERSATILE HEADBOARD ATTACHMENT - Our bed frame features thoughtfully designed front legs with reserved holes, allowing you to effortlessly attach any headboard of your choice. Customize your bedroom style with ease. (Headboard is not included).
8️⃣ WARRANTY & SERVICE - 5 Years Warranty and Free Replacement Parts Will Be Supplied. Any question Please Feel Free to Contact Our Customer Service Team for Help.

reviews.reviewerName: Stay at Home Mom in California
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Solid, perfect for us. No issues at all with assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame has to be the best I've ever purchased. Strong, sturdy and doesn't make a noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A solid frame but watch out for your toes!
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to assemble and makes a solid base even for a mattress only bed. I really like the space underneath for slide-under baskets to store things. It also has conveniently drilled holes for solidly attaching to a headboard.One down side are the frame's feet, the center ones especially but the end ones too. They are right on the edge of the frame and easy to hit with bare feet while making the bed. It would have been nice to recess them to provide some clearance that would save my toes.The other is less serious but it's very hard to move the bed once it's fully assembled with mattress and headboard. That's because it lacks casters and there's no way to attach any. It's not a serious fault as with all the under bed clearance it's easy to clean under it but make sure you assemble it where it's going because it can become a monument in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Not only easy to assemble but really study and noise free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good unit but pack your patience putting it together.
reviews.reviewText: Durable but involved assembly. Once we got the battery powered screw gun charged up and pieced together about 3 separate bit attachments to create the correct sized allen bit to tighten down the screws with, and spent a good 15 minutes laying out all the one hundred pieces on the back patio before assembling we had it built in just over 45 minutes. Stubbed my toes on the center leg on the side twice in 3 days. Just something to get used to I guess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It delivered broken
reviews.reviewText: Ummm, it delivered broken. I didn't realize it until I was half way done building the frame. But at that point I built it with one less screw and I tighten the hell out the screw that I was able to use, hoping things will stand and hold together🤞🏾...Besides that the frame is sturdy. I think I should be able to get a partial refund though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great frame but could be better
reviews.reviewText: Pro- assembly was easy. the sturdiness is wonderful, no leaning or rocking. I order the king size for my queen bed to sleep horizontal.Cons- the rounded leg are fix to one side to be Vertical, I wish they were interchangeable for any of the corners.I sleep horizontal with my bed Would like to have the aesthetic look with corners rounded off that way too.
